TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed OutputCacheSettingsSection extends System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection
Public NotInheritable Class OutputCacheSettingsSection Inherits ConfigurationSection

summary.span: 設定應用程式頁面的輸出快取設定。

span.span: Configures the output cache settings for application pages .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別可讓您以程式設計方式存取和修改`outputCacheSettings`元素`caching`組態檔中的區段。The class allows you to programmatically access and modify the `outputCacheSettings` element of the `caching` section in a configuration file. 輸出快取設定定義的相依性 (儲存在快取和快取金鑰的檔案中的項目之間的關聯性或物件)，用於輸出快取，比方說，由[@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指示詞或由。The output cache settings define the dependencies (the relationships between items stored in the cache and files, cache keys, or objects) that are used in output caching, for instance, by the [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive or by the . > [!NOTE] > 可將資訊寫入至 [區段] 屬性所定義的限制根據組態檔的相關區段其實。The can write information into the related section of the configuration file according to the restrictions defined by the section property whose value is . 任何嘗試寫入組態檔不允許在階層中的層級，將會導致由剖析器產生的錯誤訊息。Any attempt to write in a configuration file at a level not allowed in the hierarchy will result in an error message generated by the parser. 不過，您可以使用這個類別來讀取階層架構中的任何層級的組態資訊。However, you can use this class to read configuration information at any level in the hierarchy. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何取得從現有的 Web 應用程式的組態檔的物件。The following code example shows how to obtain the object from the configuration file of an existing Web application. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection/CS/OutputCacheSettingsSection.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection/VB/OutputCacheSettingsSection.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。The constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code. 它會呼叫 ASP.NET 組態系統。It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system. 取得執行個體類別使用方法。You obtain an instance of the class by using the method.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property OutputCacheProfiles As OutputCacheProfileCollection

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性可讓您以程式設計方式存取`outputCacheProfiles`組態檔中的項目。The property allows you to programmatically access the `outputCacheProfiles` element in a configuration file. 您可以使用屬性以修改`outputCacheProfiles`項目以程式設計的方式。You can use the property to modify the `outputCacheProfiles` element programmatically. `outputCacheProfiles`區段包含物件，表示輸出快取設定，可能會由應用程式中的頁面。The `outputCacheProfiles` section contains objects that represent output cache settings that may be used by pages in the application. 這些設定可以藉由設定套用至頁面`CacheProfile`屬性[@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指示詞。These settings can be applied to a page by setting the `CacheProfile` attribute of the [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive. 套用設定檔，以控制快取相依性、 快取區位置和快取過期時間 」 等屬性。Apply the profile to control caching attributes such as dependencies, cache location, and cache expiration time. [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2)指示詞可以覆寫所包含的所有設定除了屬性。The [@ OutputCache](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/28a9e101-fb44-4198-9cb6-b8a52312fec2) directive can override all the settings contained by an except the property. 這是為了確保您可以啟用或停用而不需要修改可能會覆寫它的所有頁面中的指示詞。This is to ensure you can enable or disable the without having to modify the directives in all the pages that might have overridden it. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 屬性。The following code example shows how to use the property. [!code-csharp[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection/CS/OutputCacheSettingsSection.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.Configuration.OutputCacheSettingsSection/VB/OutputCacheSettingsSection.vb#3)]
